sourcesContent:
Curso {{ course.name }} Categoria {{ course.category }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Course } from '../model/course'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent { courses: Course[] = [ { _id: "1", name: "Angular", category: "Front-End" } ]; displayedColumns = ["name", "category"] }
